sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef } from 'react'; import { FaPhone, FaWhatsapp, FaEnvelope, FaGlobeAfrica, } from 'react-icons/fa' import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser'; export default function Contact() { const form = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs .sendForm('service_2j0h6xw', 'template_npogror', form.current, { publicKey: 'OGoXfX7ReDVuC6N-m', }) .then( () => { alert('Your Request Was Successfully Sent!'); }, (error) => { alert('Sorry Your Message Was Not Sent? Try Again!', error.text); }, e.target.reset() ); }; return (
